info.description: This app provides a backend and frontend for the notification API available in Nextcloud.

parameters.name: batchSetting
parameters.description: How often E-mails about missed notifications should be sent (hourly: 1; every three hours: 2; daily: 3; weekly: 4)

parameters.name: soundNotification
parameters.description: Enable sound for notifications ('yes' or 'no')

parameters.name: soundTalk
parameters.description: Enable sound for Talk notifications ('yes' or 'no')
